statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_amount FROM healthcare_smart_contracts WHERE contract_status='Active';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_smart_contracts ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_status FROM healthcare_smart_contracts WHERE contract_amount > 1000;
SELECT contract_date FROM healthcare_smart_contracts WHERE contract_status='Completed' ORDER BY contract_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_smart_contracts WHERE smart_contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, contract_amount FROM healthcare_smart_contracts WHERE contract_status = 'Active' ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_status, contract_amount FROM healthcare_smart_contracts WHERE contract_amount > 5000 ORDER BY contract_amount DESC;
SELECT smart_contract_id, contract_name, contract_date FROM healthcare_smart_contracts WHERE patient_id = 10 AND contract_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_smart_contracts WHERE contract_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY contract_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_provider WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE record_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, provider_id, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE diagnosis IS NOT NULL;
SELECT provider_name, provider_address FROM healthcare_provider ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider WHERE specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT provider_name, provider_address FROM healthcare_provider WHERE provider_id=1;
SELECT COUNT(provider_id) AS Total_Providers FROM healthcare_provider;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(record_id) AS Total_Records FROM healthcare_provider JOIN patient_records ON healthcare_provider.provider_id = patient_records.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_address FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Common Cold';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM HealthcareProviders;
SELECT provider_name, provider_address FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE provider_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT patients.patient_name, medicalrecords.diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON patients.patient_id = medicalrecords.patient_id WHERE medicalrecords.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';

SELECT transactions.transaction_date, transactions.amount, medicalrecords.diagnosis FROM Transactions JOIN MedicalRecords ON transactions.record_id = medicalrecords.record_id ORDER BY transactions.transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 AND patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT provider_name, license_number, specialization FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT record_date, diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT block_id, record_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialization FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT provider_name, specialization FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT provider_name, license_number, specialization FROM healthcare_providers JOIN medical_records ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = medical_records.provider_id ORDER BY medical_records.record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_specialty ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 2;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM patients p JOIN medical_records mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, patient_age ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender='Female';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_location='Hospital A' ORDER BY doctor_name LIMIT 3;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id=1 AND appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM patients p JOIN medical_records mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id WHERE mr.diagnosis='COVID-19';
